title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description:
When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 
1) HTML text within <html> tags. 
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags. 
3) Text with Rich Text Format (RTF) tags, the content type specified for the dynamic text element does not have any effect.
OB: The dynamic text element should display the content of the database field based on the specified content type.
EB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the content of the database field according to the specified content type.
SR: To resolve this issue, the dynamic text element should respect the content type specified for the database field and display the content accordingly. The HTML text within <html> tags should be rendered as HTML, the HTML fragments not within <html> tags should be treated as plain text, and the text with RTF tags should be rendered with the appropriate formatting.
